name: Honorable Combat
status: Locked (becomes Active when Proving Honor is active)
description: Farkas offers a chain of sanctioned tests: win without cruelty, protect without posturing, and learn why the Companions fear becoming what they fight.

objectives.description: Speak to Farkas after Proving Honor becomes active
Complete a sanctioned spar or field trial chosen by Farkas
Return to Farkas and accept the Hall’s judgment

rewards: Mechanical boon: 'Farkas’ Guard' (GM grants a 1/session free +2 on a Fight defense when protecting an ally in your zone; write as a stunt on completion)
Unlock follow-up: a Vilkas standards quest chain (added in Phase 3)
notes: Unlocked by winning Athis spar with warrior-forward style in Phase 1.
